item.title: New Computer Who Dis?
item.description: Install Command Line Tools xcode-select --install Oh My Zsh sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" pyenv node (need to consider a package manager) Applications Visual Studio Code Docker 1Password Things 3 iStat Menus 6 Magnet Bandwidth+ Progress
